h3cMpm.name: h3cMpm

revisions.description: The initial version of this MIB file.

h3cMpm.contactinfo: Platform Team Huawei 3Com Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.huawei-3com.com Zip:100085

EnabledStatus.name: EnabledStatus
EnabledStatus.description: A simple status value for the object.

h3cMPortGroupLimitMinNumber.name: h3cMPortGroupLimitMinNumber
h3cMPortGroupLimitMinNumber.description: The lower limit of group-limit number.

h3cMPortGroupLimitMaxNumber.name: h3cMPortGroupLimitMaxNumber
h3cMPortGroupLimitMaxNumber.description: The upper limit of group-limit number.

h3cMPortGroupJoinTable.name: h3cMPortGroupJoinTable
h3cMPortGroupJoinTable.description: A table which is used for configuring a port in a specified VLAN to join a multicast group.

h3cMPortGroupJoinEntry.name: h3cMPortGroupJoinEntry
h3cMPortGroupJoinEntry.description: An entry which is used for configuring a port in a specified VLAN to join a multicast group.

h3cMPortGroupJoinVlanID.name: h3cMPortGroupJoinVlanID
h3cMPortGroupJoinVlanID.description: An index uniquely identifying a port in a specified VLAN which joined the multicast group.

h3cMPortGroupJoinAddressType.name: h3cMPortGroupJoinAddressType
h3cMPortGroupJoinAddressType.description: Type of the multicast IP address.

h3cMPortGroupJoinAddress.name: h3cMPortGroupJoinAddress
h3cMPortGroupJoinAddress.description: IP address of the group which the port belongs to, and it must be a valid multicast IP address.

h3cMPortGroupJoinStatus.name: h3cMPortGroupJoinStatus
h3cMPortGroupJoinStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation and deletion of rows, which supports 'active', 'notReady', 'createAndGo', 'destroy'. Until instances of all corresponding columns are appropriately configured, the value of the corresponding instance of the h3cMPortGroupJoinStatus column is 'notReady'. In particular, a newly created row cannot be actived until the port belongs to the corresponding VLAN and IGMP or IGMP snooping is enabled on that VLAN.

h3cMPortGroupTable.name: h3cMPortGroupTable
h3cMPortGroupTable.description: A table containing information about the status of a port which joined a multicast group in the VLAN.

h3cMPortGroupEntry.name: h3cMPortGroupEntry
h3cMPortGroupEntry.description: An entry containing information about the status of a port which joined a multicast group in the VLAN.

h3cMPortGroupVlanID.name: h3cMPortGroupVlanID
h3cMPortGroupVlanID.description: An index uniquely identifies that a port belongs to a specified VLAN.

h3cMPortGroupAddress.name: h3cMPortGroupAddress
h3cMPortGroupAddress.description: IP address of the group which the port joined, and it must be a valid multicast IP address.

h3cMPortConfigTable.name: h3cMPortConfigTable
h3cMPortConfigTable.description: A table configuring the fast leave status, group limit number and group policy parameter on a port in the specified VLAN.

h3cMPortConfigEntry.name: h3cMPortConfigEntry
h3cMPortConfigEntry.description: An entry containing information about the fast leave status, group limit number and group policy parameter of a port in the specified VLAN.

h3cMPortGroupLimitNumber.name: h3cMPortGroupLimitNumber
h3cMPortGroupLimitNumber.description: The group limit number of the port.

h3cMPortFastLeaveStatus.name: h3cMPortFastLeaveStatus
h3cMPortFastLeaveStatus.description: The fast leave status of the port.

h3cMPortGroupPolicyParameter.name: h3cMPortGroupPolicyParameter
h3cMPortGroupPolicyParameter.description: The ACL number which is used as the group policy parameter of the port.

h3cMPortConfigRowStatus.name: h3cMPortConfigRowStatus
h3cMPortConfigRowStatus.description: The object is responsible for managing the creation and deletion of rows, which supports 'active', 'notReady', 'createAndGo' and 'destroy'.

h3cMPortGroupLimitReplace.name: h3cMPortGroupLimitReplace
h3cMPortGroupLimitReplace.description: This object is related to the object h3cMPortGroupLimitNumber. If the current IGMP group number is less than the value of h3cMPortGroupLimitNumber, any new IGMP group is permitted. If the current IGMP group number equals to the value of h3cMPortGroupLimitNumber and the value of this object is enabled, the group with the minimum multicast address will be replaced by the new group. If the current IGMP group number equals to the value of h3cMPortGroupLimitNumber and the value of this object is disabled, none of new group will be permitted.

h3cHostStaticJoinTable.name: h3cHostStaticJoinTable
h3cHostStaticJoinTable.description: A table used to configure a host on a port in a specified VLAN statically to join a multicast group.

h3cHostStaticJoinEntry.name: h3cHostStaticJoinEntry
h3cHostStaticJoinEntry.description: An entry used to configure a host on a port in a specified VLAN statically to join a multicast group.

h3cHostStaticJoinVlanID.name: h3cHostStaticJoinVlanID
h3cHostStaticJoinVlanID.description: An index uniquely identify the specified VLAN in which a host on a port statically joined the multicast group.

h3cHostStaticJoinAddressType.name: h3cHostStaticJoinAddressType
h3cHostStaticJoinAddressType.description: Type of the multicast IP address.

h3cHostStaticJoinAddress.name: h3cHostStaticJoinAddress
h3cHostStaticJoinAddress.description: IP address of the group which the host belongs to, and it must be a valid multicast IP address.

h3cHostStaticJoinStatus.name: h3cHostStaticJoinStatus
h3cHostStaticJoinStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing rows, which supports 'active', 'createAndGo' and 'destroy'.
